title: Extend Signal type to support all handoff signals
description:
Update internal/engine/signals.go to add new signal types:

```go
type Signal int

const (
    SignalNone Signal = iota
    SignalComplete
    SignalEject
    SignalBlocked           // Legacy, maps to input
    SignalApprovalNeeded    // NEW
    SignalInputNeeded       // NEW  
    SignalReviewRequested   // NEW
    SignalContentReview     // NEW
    SignalEscalate          // NEW
    SignalCheckpoint        // NEW
)

func (s Signal) String() string {
    switch s {
    case SignalComplete:
        return "COMPLETE"
    case SignalEject:
        return "EJECT"
    case SignalBlocked:
        return "BLOCKED"
    case SignalApprovalNeeded:
        return "APPROVAL_NEEDED"
    case SignalInputNeeded:
        return "INPUT_NEEDED"
    case SignalReviewRequested:
        return "REVIEW_REQUESTED"
    case SignalContentReview:
        return "CONTENT_REVIEW"
    case SignalEscalate:
        return "ESCALATE"
    case SignalCheckpoint:
        return "CHECKPOINT"
    default:
        return "NONE"
    }
}
```

Acceptance criteria:
- [ ] All 8 signal types defined as constants
- [ ] String() method returns correct signal names
- [ ] SignalBlocked kept for backwards compatibility
